title: 81/374/EEC: Commission Decision of 14 May 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Nicolet- crystallographic system, model R3m', may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
Commission Decision
of 14 May 1981
establishing that the apparatus described as "Nicolet-crystallographic system, model R3m", may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(81/374/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Nicolet-crystallographic system, model R3m", which is the subject of an application by the United Kingdom of 30 October 1980, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 May 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz Narjes
Member of the Commission
[1] OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
